processes.heading: Our Process
processes.intro: We specialize in creating custom software solutions that empower businesses to achieve their unique goals.

process1.name: Project Request
process1.description: Our collaboration begins with your project request, providing clarity on your needs and allowing us to assess compatibility. If aligned, we arrange a video call.

process2.name: First Meeting
process2.description: Building trust is key. In our first meeting, we get acquainted, discuss goals and requirements, address any queries, and outline next steps.

process3.name: Planning & Execution
process3.description: We define project milestones, timelines, and expectations to ensure a seamless process from start to finish.
